messages.message:
Hello hello, new feature for Patch Professor, make sure to merge your branches with master! These labels are now supported:
• patch-professor/apply-dogfood
• patch-professor/apply-uat
• patch-professor/apply-prod
Adding the label on a merged PR will apply the patches of the respective environment to the targeted environment.
Thanks @Kerr Yoo Just a quick q - do we have the guarantee that the patches won't be applied to the targeting environment until the next deployment? Just wanted to make sure that this is the case.
